    Package Description
    fi.grimripper.loww.tiles
    Contains tiles, tile grids, and things that can be placed in tiles.

      Gets a hex by x- and y-coordinates.
      Hex[][] FilledRowHexGrid.getTiles()
      Gets hexes in the grid ordered by rows, left to right and top to bottom.
